body: Pathetic... A man does not go on a crusade without proper equipment and blessings. He should've put on the blessed purity seals and belts to protect his chastity. Seems like he wanted to get raped and pegged... He could've done more than that with proper equipment. At least bring a rope to tie those succubi with after defeating them with his built in holy sword. Get a table and dinner is served! Delicious— I mean...! he can savour them as much as he wants and use their succudicks to pleasure his gay hole. I'm sure they'd like it that way just as much. Then pull out his holy chainsaw to finish the job. We must not submit to demons. Rip and tear until it is done
yo someone pls just translate this artist's works
